column1: usually , he would be tearing [MASK] the living room , playing with his toys .
but just one [MASK] at a minion sent him practically catatonic .
that had been megan 's plan when she got him dressed earlier [MASK]
he 'd seen the movie almost by mistake , considering he was a little [MASK] for the pg cartoon , but with older cousins , along with her brothers , mason was often exposed to things that were older .
she liked to think being surrounded by adults and [MASK] kids was one reason why he was a such a good talker for his age .
`` are n't you [MASK] a good boy ? ''
instead , his baby blues remained focused on the television [MASK]
since the movie was [MASK] over , megan knew she better slip into the bedroom and finish getting ready .
